data.title: Ohio History Connection
data.meta_description: Become a Time Traveler at nearly 200 participating institutions in over 40 states.
data.text:
The Ohio History Connection is pleased to partner with Historic Hotels of America, the official program of the National Trust for Historic Preservation for recognizing and celebrating the finest Historic Hotels.

Today, Historic Hotels of America has more than 300 historic hotels. These historic hotels have all faithfully maintained their authenticity, sense of place and architectural integrity in the United States of America, including 44 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico.

To be nominated and selected for membership into this prestigious program, a hotel must be at least 50 years old; has been designated by the U.S. Secretary of the Interior as a National Historic Landmark or listed in or eligible for listing in the National Register of Historic Places; and recognized as having historic significance.

All Ohio History Connection members now have access to special travel discounts designed to help you better experience historic America. Discounts include up to 30% off the best available rate at participating Historic Hotels of America® when you book your reservation online at the Historic Hotels of America reservation page. Click here to access the member portal page where you will be required to enter your Ohio History Connection member ID number.

We are pleased to be a part of the Time Travelers program which includes more than 300 participating institutions in over 40 states, including Ohio. Ohio History Connection members receive a variety of special benefits, such as free or discounted admission or gift shop discounts, when they visit Time Travelers affiliates. Just present your Ohio History Connection membership card at the affiliated institutions to get the great discounts!

The Time Travelers network is constantly growing! Before you leave on your next vacation, be sure to contact the affiliated institutions to confirm the benefits they offer.

Click here to view the complete list and print what you need to take with you.

This benefit is available to all current Ohio History Connection members.

If you are planning to visit Ohio, be sure your itinerary includes our great historical sites! With more than 50 across the state, Ohio History Connection has a rich diversity of experiences to offer. Using your affiliated pass at the Ohio History Center & Ohio Village in Columbus allows you $1 off adult admissions for up to 4 people, and a 10% discount in our Ohio History Store. Be sure to check your Time Travelers listing for specific offers at our other sites.

As an Ohio History Connection member, you can save $3 on general admission (up to 4 tickets) to select Central Ohio museums and attractions through the Columbus Member Advantage program. No coupon is necessary. Simply show your valid Ohio History Connection membership card each time you visit! Columbus Member Advantage partners for 2024 include:

Columbus Metropolitan Club (To register for weekly forums at CMC (www.columbusmetroclub.org ) and receive your CMAP discounted rate ($40 vs $60), please email Lanie Cuthbert at [email protected] for the appropriate discount code, then visit the CMC website, choose the forum you’d like to attend, and choose the registration button labeled “Public - Affinity Partners” and when prompted, enter the code.)

Columbus Museum of Art and The Pizzuti Collection

Columbus Zoo and Aquarium

COSI (*advanced reservations required – please visit cosi.org/cma)

Dawes Arboretum

Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Gardens

LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Columbus

National Veterans Memorial and Museum

Ohio History Center

The Works: Ohio Center for History, Art and Technology

Wexner Center for the Arts

Important Terms & Restrictions: Discount good for $3 off per person on general admission only. Limit four (4) discounts per visit. Tickets must be purchased from the admissions area of the facility you are visiting. Cannot be combined with other discounts or offers. Not valid on prior purchases. No rain checks or refunds. Some restrictions may apply. Offer expires December 31, 2024 unless otherwise noted.

Premium level Ohio History Connection members receive free admission at more than 1,000 participating museums in North America. Be sure you have your current membership card with NARM sticker affixed before you travel! Most participating sites allow free admission for 2 adults and children covered by your membership, however some institutions do restrict benefits so ticketed special events or performances may not be included. NARM privileges may not extend to members with a home institution within a 15 mile radius. It is recommended that you contact the institution you plan to visit prior to visiting in order to understand the benefits you will receive at that institution.

Click here to view the complete list.

This benefit is available to Ohio History Connection Premium level members only. Your NARM sticker must be affixed to your current Premium level membership card. If you have not yet received your NARM sticker, please contact the Membership Office at [email protected] before you travel.
